headline: Staatsballett Berlin Leaders to Step Down
abstract: After only a year together on the job, Johannes Ohman and Sasha Waltz are stepping down. He will lead another house, and she will to return to choreography.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Sasha Waltz and Johannes Ohman, the joint artistic directors of the Staatsballet Berlin, announced this week they would step down at the end of 2020, though they’ve run the company together since only last year and signed on with five-year contracts.
